alert.note: Alert for Bullock; Macon; Pike (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 2:09PM CDT until August 08 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Pike County in southeastern Alabama... Bullock County in southeastern Alabama... Macon County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 209 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Montgomery to near Pine Level, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tuskegee, Union Springs, Midway, Milstead, Shorter, Franklin, Aberfoil, Franklin Field, Lake Tuskegee, Beans Crossroads, Guerryton, Shopton, Davisville, Liverpool, Hardaway, Tysonville, Victoryland, Society Hill, Warriorstand and High Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
